em.awp.name: Advanced Text Printing
em.awp.description: A powerful text printing extension. AKA: AWP. Supports Google Font and other custom styles.
em.awp.setStyle: The font style is set to [STYLE]
em.awp.fill: Insert fill text [TEXT] at X: [X] Y: [Y]
em.awp.stroke: Insert hollow text [TEXT] at X: [X] Y: [Y]
